common.copyright: Government of Canada. All rights reserved.
common.invalidPDF: Please upload a valid PDF file.

login.formTitle: Access the Government of Canada AI Assistant Portal

register.formSubtitle: Register for the Government of Canada AI Assistant Portal
register.passwordRequirements: Password must be at least 8 characters with 1 uppercase letter and 1 special character
register.successMessage: Registration successful! You can now log in.
register.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
register.passwordUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
register.passwordSpecialChar: Password must contain at least one special character

cansr.title: CAN‑SR
cansr.yourReviewsDesc: View and manage the systematic reviews you are a member of. Create a new review using the "Create review" button.
cansr.noReviews: You are not part of any reviews yet.
cansr.reviewNamePlaceholder: e.g., Effects of X on Y
cansr.reviewNameRequired: Please provide a name for the review.
cansr.viewDetails: Open to view details and continue to the next step.
cansr.modelDescription1: Newer mini model, fastest at advanced reasoning
cansr.modelDescription2: Older mini model, fastest at advanced reasoning

sr.databaseSearchDesc: Select database and define search criteria
sr.importReferencesDesc: Upload citation files, define eligibility criteria and review settings.
sr.titleAbstractScreeningDesc: Screen titles and abstracts to identify potentially relevant citations.
sr.fullTextReviewDesc: Review full text articles and make inclusion/exclusion decisions.
sr.extractionDesc: Extract outcome and study parameters for included studies.

setup.title: Import & Setup
setup.pageDesc: Upload citation files (CSV) to create a screening database. Preview the first rows below before uploading. Edit and save the screening criteria YAML used to configure columns for screening.
setup.criteriaConfigDesc: Edit the YAML used to determine L1 include columns and criteria.

search.title: Search
search.selectDatabaseDesc: Select a database and enter a search string

screening.citationsListDesc: Listing citation ids for screening database.
screening.noCitations: No citations found for this review.
screening.selectionDesc: Choose the human answer for each screening question. The AI selection is shown as default when available.
screening.noCriteria: No screening criteria found for this review.
screening.noL2Criteria: No L2 screening criteria found for this review.

extract.noParameters: No parameters found for this review or failed to load criteria.

users.manageDesc: Add or remove emails who can access this systematic review.
users.emailPlaceholder: Type an email and press Enter
